title: Is the Tamil actor Vijay a Christian, or did he convert to Christian? - Quora

response.answer_text: Vijay was born on 22 June 1974 as Joseph Vijay in Madras (now Chennai). His father S. A. Chandrasekhar is a Tamil film director and his mother Shoba is a playback singer and carnatic vocalist. He is a Roman Catholic, and received his first Holy Communion at a church in Chennai. Vijay (actor) - Wikipedia
None of the above. He is a human Being.
